description: This file defines Flask routes for managing movies, including listing and creating movies, with validation schemas, database interactions via Supabase, and detailed logging.

classes.name: MovieSchema
classes.description: Schema for serializing/deserializing movie data with validation and documentation.

classes.name: MovieCreateSchema
classes.description: Schema for validating new movie creation requests.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to fetch a list of movies from the database.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new movie record in the database.
